title: Kannukulla Song Lyrics Kaala Koothu
stanzas:
Kannukull vachirukken
nenjukulla thachiirukken
moochu kaathil
naan kalakka vaareney

enna kollum un nenappa
ullukulla bathiramaa
serthuvachi sothezhudhi
thaareney

adiyoda en manasa
madiyoda saaichavalae
inga enkkitta irukkum
usuraiyumthaan
adi ippodhe unakku
thaaren vaariye..

Kannukull vachirukken
nenjukulla thachiirukken
moochu kaathil
naan kalakka vaareney

enna kollum un nenappa
ullukulla bathiramaa
serthuvachi sothezhudhi
thaareney

Unna naan suthi paakkanume
sokkithaan nethi verkanume
enga un buthi poguratho
enna nee konjam aala vidu

aasaiyaa nerungayila
lesa nee odhunguriye
naan unna serndhidum
nerathula
nam thooramum
aadume thoorathule
thulir vedura nenje eerathula
neeyum kanneera
sindhina naanum vaaduven

en Kannukul vachirukken
nenjukulla thachiirukken
moochu kaathil
naan kalakka vaareney

enna kollum un nenappa
ullukulla bathiramaa
serthuvachi sothezhudhi
thaareney

ahh pothi naan vachcha
asaiyellaam
moththam nee thandhaa
theerumadaa

paasamaa moraikkuriye
kovamaa anaikkuriye
en kannu nee ena
aanapinna
naan paakkuren verenna
aanum pennu
enga pogaiyilim neeyum
venumnu
indha jenmathil
unmaththam unmel aaguren

adiyoda en manasa
madiyoda saaichavalae
inga enkkitta irukkum
usuraiyumthaan
adi ippodhe unakku
thaaren vaariye..

seo.title: Kannukulla Song Lyrics Kaala Koothu
seo.description: Get the complete Kannukulla Song Lyrics Kaala Koothu from Kaala Koothu. composed by Justin Prabhakaran and sung by Sathya Prakash. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Kaala Koothu, Justin Prabhakaran, Sathya Prakash, Sharanya Srinivas, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
